name: Low Grade Medical Supplies
description:
Low Grade Medical Supplies good for colds and sprains.
They don't heal Health when eaten, however.

name: Medical Supplies
description:
Strange Medical Supplies that are effective at treating Ulcer and Fracture.
Unfortunately, they have no healing effect.

name: High Grade Medical Supplies
description:
High Grade Medical Supplies that are effective at treating Weakened and Depressed.
Unfortunately, they have no healing effect.

name: Mind Control Meds
description:
Mind Control Meds that are extremely effective in controlling dissidents.
Unfortunately, they have no healing effect.

name: Suspicious Juice
description:
Juice that improves mood when consumed.
Drinking it increases work speed for a period of time,
but lowers SAN.

name: Strange Juice
description:
Juice that greatly improves mood when consumed.
Drinking it significantly increases work speed for a period of time,
but significantly lowers SAN.

name: Memory Wiping Medicine
description:
A potion that allows the player to reset their status points when consumed.
It has no effect if consumed by a Pal.

name: High Grade Technical Manual
description:
A book that contains secrets of amazing technology.
Use it to obtain a few Technology Points.

name: Innovative Technical Manual
description:
A book that contains secrets of cutting-edge technology.
Use it to obtain Technology Points.

name: Future Technical Manual
description:
A book that contains secrets of technology beyond current day comprehension.
Use it to obtain lots of Technology Points.

name: Ancient Technical Manual
description:
A book that contains long-lost secrets of technology from a forgotten era.
Use it to obtain Ancient Technology Points.

name: Repair Kit
description:
Tools for repairing structures.
Use it on destroyed structures to repair them.

name: Copper Key
description: A key that can be used to open locked treasure chests.

name: Silver Key
description: A key that can be used to open locked treasure chests.

name: Gold Key
description: A key that can be used to open locked treasure chests.

name: Bellanoir's Slab
description:
Slab depicting Bellanoir.
Offer to a Summoning Altar
to summon a powerful Lv 30 Bellanoir.

name: Bellanoir Libero's Slab
description:
Slab depicting Bellanoir Libero.
Offer to a Summoning Altar
to summon an exceptionally powerful Lv 50 Bellanoir Libero.

name: Low Quality Recovery Meds
description:
Medicine that heals wounds over time.
Low quality, but restores some Health.

name: Recovery Meds
description:
Medicine that heals wounds over time.
Restores a decent amount of Health.

name: High Quality Recovery Meds
description:
Medicine that heals wounds over time.
High quality; restores a lot of Health.

name: Vital Remedy
description:
Extremely valuable potion that permanently raises Health by a slight amount when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Stamina Remedy
description:
Extremely valuable potion that permanently raises Stamina by a slight amount when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Might Remedy
description:
Extremely valuable potion that permanently raises Attack by a slight amount when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Speed Remedy
description:
Extremely valuable potion that permanently raises Work Speed by a slight amount when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Burden Remedy
description:
Extremely valuable potion that permanently raises carrying capacity by a slight amount when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Vital Elixir
description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises Health when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Stamina Elixir
description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises Stamina when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Might Elixir
description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises Attack when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Speed Elixir
description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises Work Speed when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Burden Elixir
description:
Extremely valuable elixir that permanently raises carrying capacity when consumed.
Ineffective when used by Pals.

name: Training Manual (S)
description:
Training manual that grants a tiny amount
of EXP when read by a Pal.

name: Training Manual (M)
description:
Training manual that grants a small amount
of EXP when read by a Pal.

name: Training Manual (L)
description:
Training manual that grants a large amount
of EXP when read by a Pal.

name: Training Manual (XL)
description:
Training manual that grants a substantial amount
of EXP when read by a Pal.

name: Training Crystal
description:
Strange crystal that when given to a Pal
raises its level by one.

name: Life Fruit
description:
Precious fruit that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Slightly increases a Pal's Health.

name: Power Fruit
description:
Precious fruit that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Slightly increases a Pal's Attack.

name: Stout Fruit
description:
Precious fruit that is extremely difficult to obtain.
Slightly increases a Pal's Defense.

name: Homeward Thundercloud
description:
Transports you to the nearest base.
Cannot be used in dungeons and other similar locations.

name: Concentrated All-Pupose Pal Extract
description:
A mysterious extract that can be injected into pals to unlock their potential.
Raises Pal's rank by one.
For some reason, a resentful voice can be heard from within...

name: Bellanoir Libero (Ultra) Slab
description:
Slab overflowing with Bellanoir Libero's energy.
Offer to a Summoning Altar
to summon an inconceivably powerful (Lv ??) Bellanoir Libero.

name: Blazamut Ryu Slab
description:
Slab depicting Blazamut Ryu.
Offer to a Summoning Altar
to summon a very powerful Lv 55 Blazamut Ryu.

description:
Slab overflowing with energy of Blazamut Ryu.
Offer to a Summoning Altar
to summon an inconceivably powerful (Lv ??) Blazamut Ryu.

name: Mysterious Mushroom Juice
description:
Mushroom juice known for its incredibly uplifting effect.
Drinking it greatly boosts work speed for a period of time, 
but drastically decreases SAN value.

Offer to a Summoning Altar
to summon an exceptionally powerful Lv 60 Xenolord.

name: Revival Potion
description: A potion that revives a Pal that has been injured and is unable to move.

name: Xenolord (Ultra) Slab
description:
Slab depicting Xenolord.
Offer to a Summoning Altar
to summon an exceptionally powerful Lv ?? Xenolord.

name: Advanced Recovery Meds
description:
Medicine that heals wounds over time.
Extremely high quality, it rapidly restores HP before your eyes.

name: Applied Fire Starting TechniqueⅠ
description:
A rare book written about the secrets of Kindling. 
Allowing a Pal to read it permanently increases their Kindling affinity by +1.

name: Applied Watering TechniqueⅠ
description:
A rare book written about the secrets of Watering. 
Allowing a Pal to read it permanently increases their Watering affinity by +1.

name: Applied Seed Sowing TechniqueⅠ
description:
A rare book written about the secrets of Planting. 
Allowing a Pal to read it permanently increases their Planting affinity by +1.

name: Applied Power Generation TechniqueⅠ
description:
A rare book written about the secrets of Generating Electricity. 
Allowing a Pal to read it permanently increases their uiCommon id=|COMMON_WORK_SUITABILITY_GenerateElectricity|/> affinity by +1.

name: Applied Manual Labor TechniqueⅠ
description:
A rare book written about the secrets of Handiwork. 
Allowing a Pal to read it permanently increases their Handiwork affinity by +1.

name: Applied Gathering TechniqueⅠ

name: Applied Mining TechniqueⅠ
